courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: ECON 302 and ECON 303, or equivalent. MSPE Graduate Student Standing.
description: Examines the balance of payments, exchange rate, capital flows and international monetary system; fiscal and monetary policy in open economies. Prerequisite: ECON 302 and ECON 303, or equivalent. MSPE Graduate Student Standing.
label: International Financial
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graduate - Urbana-Champaign. Restricted to MS:Economics:Policy Econ -UIUC.
